name: STATION - Train Crowd Simulation
description:
This is a new crowd simulation game!
You are station staff of the railway companies of Japan most complex in the world!
Let's adjust the train passengers so as not to flood the home!


[tips]
You can carry more passengers by knowing the behavior patterns of the train and the crowd!

[pattern of train]
1. Number of people who come down are different.
People who get off the train of green most often.
However, people who get off the train of yellow fewest.

2. Interval train until the next comes is different.
The next train is coming soon Home green train came.
However, the next train does not come easily to home train yellow came.

[behavior patterns of crowd]
1. Law that are gathered from nearby.
Passengers tending to align to the home from the nearest ticket.

2. Law of impersonation.
Passengers tending to align the home passengers dressed in the same color as their own in many cases.
